title.rendered: VIDEO: Lamborghini Huracan Spyder & Huracan Avio Launch

content.rendered:
Here is the official coverage of our Lamborghini Huracan Spyder & Huracan Avio launch!

Prestige Motorcars is very proud to be able to launch these two great Lamborghini Huracans. The main event was focused around the Huracan Spyder, however we thought we could up the ante by surprising our audience with the Huracan Avio. The Avio is limited to only 250 units worldwide and to receive one and launch the first in Indonesia was an honour.
